channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How LinkedIn Scaled User Restriction System to 5 Million Queries Per Second】LinkedIn如何将用户限制系统缩放到每秒500万查询
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the LinkedIn Engineering Blog.】免责声明：本文中的详细信息来自 LinkedIn 工程博客。

item.title: 【Understanding Message Queues】了解消息队列
item.description: 【Asynchronous communication has become an important strategy for modern software systems, particularly in distributed and large-scale applications.】异步通信已成为现代软件系统的重要策略，特别是在分布式和大规模应用程序中。

item.title: 【Top Strategies to Reduce Latency】减少延迟的最佳策略
item.description: 【Latency is a fundamental concept to consider when designing any application.】延迟是设计任何应用程序时要考虑的基本概念。

item.title: 【From Monolith to Microservices: Key Transition Patterns】从整体到微服务：关键过渡模式
item.description: 【Monolithic architecture is a software development approach in which the entire application is built as a single, unified codebase.】Monolithic Architecture是一种软件开发方法，其中整个应用程序都是单个统一的代码库。

item.description: 【You don’t need to spend a fortune to build an AI application.】您无需花钱就可以构建AI应用程序。
